CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Let us know how we can help you find your next great read.
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Hear from book lovers who enjoy our service
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app is a bookworm's dream come true! The vast selection and easy checkout process make buying books a breeze.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: I love being able to find rare and out-of-print titles on this app. It has expanded my reading horizons!
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As an author, I appreciate the platform this app provides to reach more readers. The book discovery features are top-notch.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Explore our massive collection of books across every genre, from best-selling novels to rare gems. Find your next great read with ease.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Our intelligent algorithms analyze your preferences and reading history to suggest tailored book recommendations just for you.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Browse, purchase, and have books delivered straight to your doorstep with our seamless online shopping experience.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Get honest insights from fellow readers with our extensive user review system, helping you make informed purchasing decisions.
FEATURE_5_BODY: In addition to physical books, access our vast library of ebooks and audiobooks for convenient reading on-the-go.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Join or create online book clubs to discuss your favorite titles, share recommendations, and connect with fellow book lovers.
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Book Marketplace
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: How do I search for books?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: You can search for books by title, author, genre, or keyword using the search bar on our website. Our advanced filters also allow you to narrow down results by price, condition, and other criteria.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: Can I sell books on your platform?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Absolutely! We make it easy for individuals to list and sell their used books. Simply create a seller account, describe the book's condition, set your price, and you're ready to go.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: What payment methods do you accept?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: We accept all major credit cards as well as secure online payment methods like PayPal for maximum convenience and security.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Free shipping is available on many book orders over a certain price threshold. During checkout, you'll be able to see if your order qualifies for free shipping.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Find answers to common questions about purchasing books on our app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: How do I search for books?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: You can search for books by title, author, genre, or keyword in the search bar at the top of the app.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: Can I read previews before buying?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Yes, we offer preview samples of most books so you can get a sneak peek before purchasing.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and mobile wallets for secure and convenient payment.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Do you offer discounts or promotions?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Definitely! Be sure to check the 'Deals' section for current discounts, bundle offers, and promotional codes.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: How do I access my purchased books?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Your book library is easily accessible through the 'My Books' section of the app. Simply download titles to start reading anytime!
